cast.name: Les Brown and His Band of Renown

roles.char: Les Brown and his Band of Renown

title: Episode dated 7 April 1957
description: Bob Hope and Frank Sinatra appear as baseball players in a comedy sketch. Bob and Janis Paige appear as kitchen workers who pretend they are wealthy to impress the other. Frank and Janis sing several tunes and Bob tries to convince a teenaged Natalie Wood that she needs to date more mature men (such as he).

cast.name: Les Brown and His Band of Renown

title: Episode dated 13 March 1963
description: Bob plays an overage rock and roll star in a radio station skit with Brenda Lee, and a ruthless TV network boss determined to cancel Goulet as a suicidal star of a medical programme. Edie introduces the annual parade of "Deb Stars" for 1963.

cast.name: Les Brown and His Band of Renown

title: Episode dated 28 September 1966
description: Bob Hope is reunited with several of his screen leading ladies.
